title: Dekton 10/XL Snug Fit PU Coated Working Gloves | Flexible & Strong Protection | Ideal for Workshop & DIY Tasks | Anti-Slip Latex Coating | CE Cat 2 & EN388 Certified for Superior Mechanical Protection
features: Ultimate Protection with Flexible Design: The Dekton Size 10/XL Working Gloves feature a PU coating that offers superior protection while maintaining flexibility. This design ensures strong resistance to cuts and abrasions, making these gloves ideal for various workshop and DIY tasks where durability and dexterity are essential.

Anti-Slip Latex Coating for Enhanced Safety: Equipped with an anti-slip latex coating, these gloves provide excellent grip and control. This feature reduces the risk of slippage when handling tools and materials, ensuring a secure hold and improving overall safety during work.

CE Cat 2 & EN388 Certified: These gloves are CE Category 2 and EN388 certified, meeting rigorous safety and quality standards. The certification confirms their effectiveness in protecting against mechanical risks such as abrasion, blade cuts, tearing, and puncturing, providing reliable protection.

Snug Fit for Comfortable Wear: Designed with a snug fit, these gloves offer enhanced comfort and precision. The close-fitting design ensures that the gloves stay securely in place during use, reducing the chance of interference and enhancing your control over tools and materials.

Ideal for Workshop & DIY Use: Perfect for a wide range of applications, from detailed DIY projects to intensive workshop tasks, these gloves deliver the protection and flexibility needed for a variety of tasks. Whether you're working on intricate repairs or handling heavy-duty materials, the Dekton gloves provide the performance you need.
description: From the manufacturer SNUG FIT GLOVES SIZE 10/XLARGE Ultimate protection. Ideal for DIY, tradesmen and builders where extra protection is required. Ultra grip material for added safety. Latex coated. CE CAT II. ADVANCED FEATURES FULLY TESTED AND CERTIFIED Fully tested and certified. CE CAT II. PU COATED GRIP Ultimate protection. Ultra grip material for added safety. PU coated. AVAILABLE IN 3 SIZES Available in the following sizes: DT70724 Size 8 / Medium. DT70728 Size 9 / Large. DT70730 Size 10 / X Large. IDEAL FOR: DIY. Tradesmen. Builders. Where extra protection is required.
